description: Try our easy to follow Hokkien Noodles With Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hokkien Noodles With Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, add the noodles to the boiling water and cook for 1 minute. Add the pork to the wok, pour in the oyster sauce mixture and toss over the heat for 1 minute, until everything is heated. Drain the noodles, mix with the stir-fried pork and vegetables, and serve hot.
